page.title: Losing Our Religion: The Liberal Media's Attack on Christianity

*Newsweekâs review of the Christian bestseller "[[Left Behind]]" said, "''Sociologists tell us that the United States is experiencing a religious revival, but if the bestseller lists are any guide, the revival looks more like a collective leaving of the senses.''"
